name: John Smith
response0: Well I'm just great! It feels wonderful outside doesn't it? I've got a busy day ahead of me, but hey - how are you? How's your day going?
response1: Look, we are working hard on a draft, details will be given as soon as we have them.
response2: I will not speak for the President on such matters.
response3: These are very serious accusations that are surely baseless. Russia's leader has never met at Trump's hotel, and even the Supreme Court would find the President innocent.
response4: All I know about Russia is that they are an enemy of democracy.
response5: The dealings of Trump Hotel are no business of mine.
response6: Yeah, it's a nice tie isn't it? I do like it. Gail picked it out for me, she says I look Presidential.
response7: Wow it feels SO nice outside today doesn't it? I just love it. My dad and I used to go fishing or throw the football around on days like this. I heard it's supposed to be like this for the rest of the week! I sure hope so, I can't wait.
response9: The Supreme Court will decide what's best for the American people. All talk of collusion, POTUS hotel, and Russia will be done for good.

name: Joe Shmoe
response1: It's rumored that the ACA repeal will result in 20 million people losing their insurance. Yet Congress continues to push this bill through! Maybe there is a way for SCOTUS to prevent it.
response2: Big red button? Has he pushed it? Do you know? I heard it initiates nukes to hit the capital cities of each targeted nation. Do you know where the button is located? Is it in the Oval Office?
response3: I know the President must be sweating worrying about this case. His top campaign aides have serious ties to Russia, and Congress knows it. Do you know if a decision has been made to move forward on the latest news?
response4: Pretty much every Intelligence agency in our country agrees that Putin and Russia's government interfered with our election. There's something with Trump Hotel - we just have to figure out what it is.
response5: Trump Hotel is at the center of the collusion case. Show me a smoking gun and I'll make us both famous.
response8: Hair..strands? I don't really know what you mean…
response9: SCOTUS is fair. They are our last hope to hold us justice in the US.
